metadataTools 0.1.0
  • Reference

View a naming convention in a readable table

view_naming_convention.Rd

Displays the naming convention tibble using flextable formatting.

Usage

view_naming_convention(naming_object)

Arguments

naming_object

A tibble with columns: name, mandatory, valid_values, default_description

Value

A flextable object

Examples

ft<-view_naming_convention(EcoForest_naming)
print(ft)
